#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
static int table[] = {
    0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 6, 2, 4, 8, 1, 3, 9, 7, 6, 4, 6, 4, 
    5, 5, 5, 5, 6, 6, 6, 6, 1, 7, 9, 3, 6, 8, 4, 2, 1, 9, 1, 9
};

int unit_digit(int n, int a)
{
    return table[((n%10)<<2)+(a&3)];
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0)
	{
		long long int b,a;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		if(b==0)
		{
			cout<<1<<endl;
		}
		else if(a==0)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
		}
		else{
			int d=unit_digit(a,b);
			cout<<d<<endl;
		}
		t--;
	}
}
